channel.title: JUst one error i need help with
channel.description:
well im codeing my first server and then i put sum new npcs in and change what they say. then i compile and bam. a piece of code tht i didnt editing now has an error heres what the compiler says "npchandler.java:720: illegal start of expression public static boolean IsDropping = false;"
i found the code and heres what the code is: [code]public static boolean IsDropping = false; public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)[/code]
tell me wots wrong and how to fix it plz and dnt flame if its a nooby error thats the simpilest because i seriously am the worst coder

item.title: JUst one error i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

I suggest siging up for ImageShack, and clicking remove the bar…
Also, when signed up, upload it, go to My Images, find this one, click the I or ? above it, copy the link that says “Forums:”.

Read full topic

@funtwo wrote:

well im codeing my first server and then i put sum new npcs in and change what they say. then i compile and bam. a piece of code tht i didnt editing now has an error heres what the compiler says
“npchandler.java:720: illegal start of expression
public static boolean IsDropping = false;”

i found the code and heres what the code is:

public static boolean IsDropping = false; public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)

tell me wots wrong and how to fix it plz
and dnt flame if its a nooby error thats the simpilest because i seriously am the worst coder
